page.title: 06TONMAWR - THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: {Tonmawr Primary School}is located at the centre of the village. The main school building is largely made of corrugated steel sheets on a sandstone base although extra facilities -an office and indoor toilets have been built on using bricks. The school currently has just over 80 children on its rolls - ranging in age from 3.5 years(the nursery pupils) to 11. There is a teaching staff of 4, including a headteacher who also has full time charge of his class. The school has a nursery class for children under 4.5. The school has an acre field attached to it which is being converted into a nature reserve and adventure playground.
